ComicInfo.Summary:
Cheval Noir presents some of the finest comics produced by creators from around the world! "Chninkel" by Rosinski and Van-Hamme continues, as well as Cosey's "Voyage to Italy"! This issue premiers the first chapter of Tardi's "The Mad Scientist" with Adele Blanc Sec, as Andreas' "Rork: Book Two" continues. This issue also features another chapter of Haldeman and Marvano's "Forever Wars: Book Two." *Story Titles * The Great Power of the Chninkel Chapter 3: G'Wel The Eyeball Kid Episode 6: Heart of Darkness Our Secret Shame The Voyage To Italy Chapter 3 Rork Passages Flashback: The Great Secret The Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: The Mad Scientist Chapter 1 A Leg Post Apocalypse The Forever War Book 2 Chapter 2
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-15/4000-33828/
ComicInfo.Title: G'Wel (Chapter Three); Heart of Darkness (Episode VI); Our Secret Shame; The Voyage to Italy Chapter Three; The Great Secret (Passages Part 1); The Mad Scientist Chapter I; A Leg; The Forever War Book Two: Chapter Two
